text: Very friendly over the counter staff though there was a long queue during lunch peak. Offers a great variety of cakes, muffins, non food items as well. Service was fast despite the lunch peak. Hard to get a seat though.

This morning I went and requested for a tall macchiato. While the menu said caramel macchiato, I specifically told the barista that I wanted it without caramel as I didn’t like it sweeten. When I took the coffee, it felt so heavy and opened up and it’s full to the brim! Went and asked the barista is this macchiato and he with a straight face said “yes, it is like that”. I may not be a coffee connoisseur but this is so wrong. It shows that the barista doesn’t even have basic knowledge, “great training” Starbucks! Wasted $7!
my three boys and i were at the outlet earlier today at around noon, and we received the best service from the staff on duty. really made my kids’ day. thank you ❤️❤️❤️

The worst cappuccino i’ve ever had. Starbucks is generally pretty bad at making coffee. I am not sure why people go there. I thought of trying this place as i moved to this area. Should have expected the worst coffee here too. Never again.
Love the energy boosting vanilla latte. Fairy spacious and super convenient Starbucks located in the Mapletree Business City. Ideal place for a relaxing chitchat if you skip the peak hours.
